subject: Automobiles
Talladega Superspeedway
Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Nascar tweaked two rules for next month’s race at Talladega Superspeedway, apparently in an effort to limit the two-car tandem racing that has dominated at its two fastest tracks.
snippet: Nascar tweaked two rules for next month’s race at Talladega Superspeedway, apparently in an effort to limit the two-car tandem racing that has dominated at its two fastest tracks.
